en.INFO_DESC: Ein multifunktions Bot, der für folgendes genutzt werden kann: Erinnerungen setzen, Nachrichten, Coronavirus Statistiken, Hypixel Statistiken, und vieles mehr.
en.BOT_SYSTEM_DESC: Es sind mehr Information vorhanden, da der Befehl von einem Meon-Entwickler ausgeführt wurde
en.INV_CLICK_HERE: Hier klicken, um Meon deinem Server hinzuzufügen!
en.SUPPORT_TEXT: Wenn du Fragen hast, trete dem Support-Server bei und erstelle ein Ticket.
en.VOTE_TEXT: Mit diesem link kannst du alle 12 Stunden auf top.gg für Meon abstimmen.
en.DASHBOARD_TEXT: Hier klicken, um zu dem Dashboard deines Servers zu gelangen.
8BALL_RESPONSES: Das sollte ich dir gerade lieber nicht sagen.
Das kann ich gerade nicht vorhersagen.
Darauf würde ich mich nicht verlassen.
Ja, da bin ich mir sicher.
Meinen Quellen nach zu urteilen, nein.
Woher soll ich das denn wissen, Digga?

RATE_DESCRIPTIONS.-1: Es sollte eigentlich illegal sein, so schlecht zu sein.
RATE_DESCRIPTIONS.31: Wer dieses Rating hat ist dumm XD

en.REPLAY: Feature exklusiv für gerankete Spieler, welches erlaubt vergangene Spiele wieder abzuspielen.
en.LIMBO: Ein mysteriöser Ort, zu dem Spieler geschickt werden, wenn ihre Verbindung fehlschlägt, oder wenn die Lobby geschlossen wird.
en.QUEUE: Nicht gerankte Spieler kommen in eine Warteschlange, wenn der Server 90-100k Spieler hat.
en.WATCHDOG_LAST_MIN_BANS: Von Watchdog in der letzten Minute gabannt
en.HYPIXEL_API_ERROR: Die Hypixel-API ist im Moment nicht erreichbar.
en.PLAYER_NOT_FOUND: Dieser Spieler scheint nicht zu existieren!
en.PLAYER_NO_HYPIXEL: That player exists but doesn't have a Hypixel account!
Dieser Spieler existiert, hat aber keinen Hypixel-Account!
en.ALL_DATES_IN_LOCAL: All dates and times are in local time
en.GUILD_NOT_FOUND: That guild doesn't seem to exist!
en.SB_PROFILE_NOT_FOUND: That player doesn't have a SkyBlock profile!
en.KICK_SELF: If you don't want to be in the server just leave lol.
en.SUCCESSFULLY_KICKED_MEMBER: **{}** has been kicked from the server successfully.
en.BAN_SELF: If you don't want to be in the server just leave lol.
en.SUCCESSFULLY_BANNED_MEMBER: **{}** has been banned from the server successfully.
en.ERROR_PURGE_MAX_100: You can only purge up to 100 messages at a time.
en.CONFIRM_NUKE_MESSAGE: Sicher, dass du das tun möchtest? **Alles in diesem Kanal wird gelöscht.**
DELETION_MSG: y u make me do dis :pensive:
en.SESSION_SOMEONE_ELSE: This session belongs to someone else!
COMPLETE_MSG: Explosion sounds and pixelated explosions boom
en.CUSTOMIZE_DASHBOARD: Tip: You can also customize these settings on the dashboard! https://dashboard.meonbot.xyz/
en.ERROR_DISABLE: You can't disable something you haven't set up!
en.CHANGING_PREFIX_DESC: Add `{{s}}` to the end of your prefix if you want your prefix to have a space at the end. Do `{}prefix reset` to reset the prefix.
en.PREFIX_ERROR_SET_SLASH: You cannot set the prefix as `/`!
en.PREFIX_ERROR_OLD_PREFIX: New prefix cannot be the same as old prefix!
en.PREFIX_ERROR_ONLY_SPACE: New prefix can't **ONLY** be a space!
en.PREFIX_ERROR_START_WITH_SPACE: New prefix can't start with a space!
en.CMDNTF_ON: You will now receive an error message if the command you tried to use does not exist.
en.CMDNTF_OFF: You will no longer receive an error message if the command you tried to use does not exist.
en.PE_OFF: Your members will no longer be notified if they use the prefix `{}` when the actual prefix is different.
en.PE_ON: Your members will now be notified if they use the prefix `{}` when the actual prefix is different.
en.CHANNEL_TIP: Tip: Channels use "-" instead of spaces.
en.LOG_NOW_SEND: Meon will now send log messages in <#{}>.
en.LOG_NO_LONGER_SEND: Meon will no longer send log messages in <#{}>.
en.ROLE_NOW_IGNORE: Meon will now ignore users with the {} role.
en.ROLE_NO_LONGER_IGNORE: Meon will no longer ignore users with the {} role.
en.CLEARED_LIST: You have cleared your blocked words list.
en.FILTER_ON: Your filter was on when you ran this command. Meon can't function without a blocked words list so the feature has been turned off.
en.NO_LONGER_ALLOWED_WORDS: The word(s) ||{}|| are no longer allowed on your server.
en.BLOCKED_WORDS_NOTE: Note that the profanity filter is still off. Enable it with `{}antiswear toggle` to protect your server.
en.NOW_SAFE_FROM_BAD_WORDS: Your server is now safe from any bad words.
en.NO_LONGER_SAFE_FROM_BAD_WORDS: Your server is no longer safe from any bad words.
en.NOT_SET_UP_BAD_WORDS:
You have not set up any words to block! Use the command below to add some!
`{}antiswear block <word>, [word], [word], ...`
en.LIST_TOGGLE: Here's a list of settings you can toggle on or off.
en.TOGGLE_HELP_COMMANDNOTFOUND: Displays an error message if the command you were looking for does not exist.
en.TOGGLE_HELP_PREFIXERROR: Displays an error message if a member tries to use the prefix `{}` when the actual prefix is different. It is recommended that you disable this if you have more than one bot with the prefix `{}`.
en.ANTI_PROFANITY_DESC: Meon's anti-profanity filter will scan and remove any bad words people send!
en.ANTI_PROFANITY_PERM: Users with the `ADMINISTRATOR` permission will always be ignored. You may also set a moderator role which will be ignored as well.
en.ANTI_PROFANITY_TOGGLE: Toggle this feature with `{}antiswear toggle on/off`
en.SET_BLOCKED_WORDS: *Set blocked words with `{}antiswear block <word>, [word], [word] ...` and reset them with `{}antiswear block disable`.*
en.SET_LOG_CHANNEL: *Set log channel with `{}antiswear log <channel>` and reset them with `{}antiswear log disable`.*
en.SET_IGNORE_ROLE: *Set ignored role with `{}antiswear ignore <role>` and reset them with `{}antiswear ignore disable`.*
en.MESSAGE_CONTENT_EMPTY: The message content cannot be empty!
